name: Combat Drones

Flash

name: Hoverbike

name: Swallowers of Civilization
rulesText:
Swallowers of Civilization costs 1 more to issue for each land you control.
When you issue Swallowers of Civilization, destroy target permanent.

name: Amlich Security
rulesText:
+1: Displace up to one target nontoken unit.
-2: You gain a tag with “Units can’t attack you or an organization you control unless their controller pays 1 for each of those units.”
-6: You gain a tag with “If a nontoken unit would enter the battlefield under an opponent’s control and it wasn’t issued, dematerialise it instead.”

name: Bergstadt Justice
rulesText:
You may dematerialise Bergstadt Justice as you draw it if you control a Plains.
As long as Bergstadt Justice is dematerialised, when a unit attacks you or an organization you control, issue Bergstadt Justice without paying its resource cost.
Destroy target attacking unit.

name: Biomech Corps
rulesText: When Biomech Corps enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.

name: Cache Mapper
rulesText: When Cache Mapper enters the battlefield, arm it. (Create a colorless Equipment device token attached to this unit. It has “Equipped unit gets +1/+1” and equip 2.)

name: Comms Disruptor
rulesText:
Whenever a card is dematerialised, put a +1/+1 counter on equipped unit. If you did, target opponent chooses main phase or combat phase. That player skips each instance of the chosen phase during his or her next turn.
Equip 2

name: Community Officer
rulesText: When Community Officer enters the battlefield, you may displace another target unit. (Dematerialise that unit. Return it to the battlefield under its owner’s control at the beginning of the next end step.)

name: Crash Landing
rulesText:

Create two 1/1 white Military unit tokens.

name: Cryonics Facility

4WW: Put a +1/+1 counter on each unit you control.

name: Fleet Overseer
rulesText: Whenever another unit enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 2 life.

name: Inspired Charge
rulesText: Units you control get +2/+1 until end of turn.

name: Coulomb Busters

Destroy target device.

rulesText: R, T, Sacrifice a device: Slagthrower deals 2 damage to target unit or player and 2 damage to you. Activate this ability only any time you could issue a strategy.

name: Slipstream Hunter
rulesText:
First strike
When Slipstream Hunter enters the battlefield, create two 0/1 colorless Hologram device unit tokens.
Tap two untapped devices you control: Slipstream Hunter deals 1 damage to target player.

name: Speed Demon
rulesText:
Haste
Plunder (Whenever this unit deals combat damage to a player, create a colorless Credit device token.)
At the beginning of your end step, sacrifice Speed Demon unless you sacrifice a device.

name: Supervolcanic Fallout
rulesText:
Supervolcanic Fallout deals 3 damage to each player.
Displace up to three target units your opponents control. (Dematerialise those units. Return them to the battlefield under their owners’ control at the beginning of the next end step.)

name: Supply Runner
rulesText: Whenever Supply Runner deals combat damage to a player, arm it. (Create a colorless Equipment device token attached to this unit. It has “Equipped unit gets +1/+1” and equip 2.)

name: Vulcan Devastators
rulesText: Sacrifice a device: Vulcan Devastators gains haste until end of turn.

name: Walking Furnace
rulesText: Whenever you sacrifice another device, you may pay 2. If you do, Walking Furnace deals 2 damage to target unit or player.

name: Warapur Company Flagship
rulesText:
Flying
Warapur Company Flagship and other Mercenary units you control have plunder.  (Whenever it deals combat damage to a player, create a colorless Credit device token.)
Sacrifice four devices: Warapur Company Flagship deals 4 damage to target unit or player.

name: Warapur Company Grunt
rulesText:
Plunder (Whenever this unit deals combat damage to a player, create a colorless Credit device token.)
Whenever Warapur Company Grunt attacks, you may sacrifice a device. If you do, create a 1/1 colorless Mech device unit token.

name: Warapur Company Heavy
rulesText:
Trample, plunder (Whenever this unit deals combat damage to a player, create a colorless Credit device token.)
Whenever Warapur Company Heavy attacks, sacrifice any number of devices. Warapur Company Heavy gets +2/+0 until end of turn for each device sacrificed this way.

name: Wild Game Huntmaster
rulesText: Whenever a unit you control becomes the target of an order, that unit gains double strike until end of turn.

name: Al Maham Pathfinder
rulesText:
When Al Maham Pathfinder enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Mech device unit token.
Whenever a unit you control becomes the target of an order, units you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

rulesText: Whenever a unit you control becomes the target of an order, that unit gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

name: Baljurashi Wanderer
rulesText: Whenever a unit you control becomes the target of an order, that unit gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

name: Bioarchitect
rulesText: T: Activate an activated ability of another target permanent you control without paying its costs.

name: Biocourier
rulesText: Whenever another unit dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Biocourier and Biocourier gains shroud until end of turn. (This unit can’t be the target of orders or abilities.)

name: Brood Ambush
rulesText: Create two 1/1 green Xeno Scion unit tokens. They have “Sacrifice this unit: Add C to your resource pool.”

name: Deep into the Subconscious
rulesText: Target unit you control gets +1/+2 and gains shroud until end of turn.

name: Ecosystem Collapse

Trample

name: Frontier Anatomist

name: Genome Toggle
rulesText: Sacrifice any number of units. Create a 6/6 green Mutant unit token for each unit sacrificed this way.

name: Gestation Cycle
rulesText:
Modify unit
When modified unit dies, create an X/X green Mutant unit token, where X is the number of +1/+1 counters on it.
2G: Put a +1/+1 counter on modified unit.

name: Growth Genetics
rulesText:
Modify unit
Modified unit gets +5/+5 and has mutate. (When it dies, its controller reveals cards from the top of his or her library until he or she reveals a unit card that costs less. That player puts that card onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of his or her library in a random order.)

name: Incubation Hulk
rulesText: When Incubation Hulk dies, create three 2/2 green Xeno Propagator unit tokens with “When this unit dies, create three 1/1 green Xeno Scion unit tokens. They have ‘Sacrifice this unit: Add C to your resource pool.’”

rulesText:
Flying, trample
Prevent all combat damage that units without flying or reach would deal to The Kishar.
Whenever The Kishar enters the battlefield or attacks, create three 1/1 green Xeno Scion unit tokens. They have “Sacrifice this unit: Add C to your psi cache.”

name: Kushak Artifact
rulesText: Whenever a nontoken unit you control deals combat damage to a player, you may pay its resource cost and sacrifice it. If you do, create two tokens that are copies of that unit.

rulesText: 2, T, Sacrifice a unit: Create two 1/1 green Xeno Scion unit tokens. They have “Sacrifice this unit: Add C to your resource pool.”

name: Kushak Interference
rulesText:
You may dematerialise Kushak Interference as you draw it if you control a Forest.
As long as Kushak Interference is dematerialised, when a unit you control becomes the target of an order, issue Kushak Interference without paying its resource cost.
Target unit gets +3/+3 and gains shroud until end of turn.

name: Kushak R&D, Basirah Branch
rulesText:
+1: Create a 1/1 green Xeno Scion unit token. It has “Sacrifice this unit: Add C to your psi cache.”
-4: Destroy target device or development. Create two 1/1 green Xeno Scion unit tokens. They have “Sacrifice this unit: Add C to your psi cache.”
-5: Put a +1/+1 counter on each Xeno unit you control for each Xeno unit you control.

name: Kushak Research Council
rulesText:
Each other unit you control that’s a Mutant or a Xeno gets +1/+1 and has mutate.
Mutate (When this unit dies, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a unit card that costs less. Put that card onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

name: Lifestrider

Put two +1/+1 counters on target unit.
4G: Return Mutagenic Serum from your trashpile to your hand.

Mutate (When this unit dies, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a unit card that costs less. Put that card onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

name: High Judge Zephynius

Flying, vigilance
Whenever a card is dematerialised, put a +1/+1 counter on Wings of the Law.

name: Twilight Strider
rulesText:
Infiltrate (Whenever this unit attacks with exactly one other unit, it can’t be blocked this turn.)
At the beginning of each end step, if a player lost life this turn, untap Twilight Strider and each opponent loses 1 life.

rulesText:
Infiltrate (Whenever this unit attacks with exactly one other unit, it can’t be blocked this turn.)
Whenever Whisper, the Cleaner deals combat damage to a player, choose one —

• You draw a card.
